#TEST AND corret 3
10000010 # LDI R0, 11111111
00000000
11111111
10000010 # LDI R2,00000011
00000010
00000011
10101000 #AND R0, R2
00000000
00000010
01000111 # PRN R0
00000000

#TEST XOR corret 4
10000010 # LDI R0, 11111010
00000000
11111010
10000010 # LDI R2,11111110
00000010
11111110
10101011 #XOR R0, R2
00000000
00000010
01000111 # PRN R0
00000000

#TEST SHL corret 4
10000010 # LDI R0, 00000010
00000000
00000010
10000010 # LDI R2,00000001
00000010
00000001
10101100 #SHL R0, R2
00000000
00000010
01000111 # PRN R0
00000000

#TEST OR corret 3
10000010 # LDI R0, 00000010
00000000
00000010
10000010 # LDI R2,00000001
00000010
00000001
10101010 #OR R0, R2
00000000
00000010
01000111 # PRN R0
00000000

#TEST SHR corret 1
10000010 # LDI R0, 00000010
00000000
00000010
10000010 # LDI R2,00000001
00000010
00000001
10101101 #SHR R0, R2
00000000
00000010
01000111 # PRN R0
00000000

#TEST NOT corret -255
10000010 # LDI R0, 11111110
00000000
11111110
01101001 #NOT R0
00000000
01000111 # PRN R0
00000000


#TEST MOD corret 3
10000010 # LDI R0, 00010000
00000000
00010000
10000010 # LDI R2,00000101
00000010
00000101
10100100 #MOD R0, R2
00000000
00000010
01000111 # PRN R0
00000000
00000001 # HLT
